Recruiting

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We help many organizations with plug-and-play support to meet specific hiring needs across go-to-market functions.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#E8665E” _builder_version=”4.16″ toggle_font=”Bungee||||||||” toggle_font_size=”14px” toggle_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”3%” border_width_all=”0px” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Role Intake Process” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px”]On every search, the team runs a comprehensive intake to review candidate profiles, role responsibilities, compensation, benefits, and current state hiring process. We’ll then work with you to develop an updated approach to ensure a high level of coordination at every step of the way, ensuring we are maintaining strong candidate experience while maximizing our collective success closing exceptional candidates.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Comprehensive Sourcing” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Our team uses multiple modern recruiting platforms and resources to engage candidates across channels. We also maintain a database of qualified candidates and network contacts for proactive outreach and potential referrals. [/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Screening & Interview Coordination” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Unlike many traditional recruiting firms, Blueprint runs thorough screens on every candidate prior to submission to ensure soft and hard skills alignment for each opportunity. We also offer additional interview coordination and participation services at every step of the hiring process.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Specialty Roles” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]

  • BDRs & SDRs (inbound, outbound, enterprise)
  • Account Executives (SMB, Commercial, Enterprise, Strategic, Channel Sales)
  • Marketing (Content, Demand Generation, ABM, Field, Corporate, Product)
  • Customer Success & Support (CSM, Onboarding, Customer Education, Support)
  • Pre-sales and Revenue Operations (Operations & Enablement)
  • First and Second line Sales Leaders

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” admin_label=”Services Section” In partnership with Skaled, we also offer integrated sales playbook development services to ensure your existing team is enabled and upskilled as you hire.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding_tablet=”70px|8%||12%” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Staatliches||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#242855″ header_2_font_size=”3em” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”3vh||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”|||30px” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_fold=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”3.2em” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_left=”8px” border_color_left=”#F5B15E” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Recruit & Ramp

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]Even the most promising new hires struggle without solid onboarding to accelerate their learning. These programs also prove critical to attracting discerning talent and enhancing your employer brand.

Unlike other sales recruiters, Blueprint offers a full recruitment and ramp solution for organizations requiring a more comprehensive approach to their sales hiring efforts.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#F5B15E” _builder_version=”4.16″ toggle_font=”Bungee||||||||” toggle_font_size=”14px” toggle_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”3%” border_width_all=”0px” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Role profile and job descriptions” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px”]We can help develop specific role profiles and job descriptions to ensure that every requisition opened includes a clear delineation of responsibilities and requirements to attract the best candidates and set clear expectations while also highlighting your value proposition and company intangibles.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”New hire program development” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Before commencing recruiting services, we can work with you to develop onboarding services, including build out or necessary refinement of existing sales playbook and enablement materials that equip new (and existing) hires with the right concepts and resources to talk about the business and run your sales process from prospecting to close and beyond.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Sourcing and recruiting services” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Our sourcing and recruitment services work tightly off the foundational work done to build out your onboarding structure and refine existing materials. We leverage that work and insights to ensure that prospective candidates get a crystal clear sense of what to expect after joining your organization.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Guided onboarding for new hire cohorts” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]

Our services do not end on day one. Leverage our team to help guide your new hires through structured sales onboarding materials to accelerate their development, minimize churn risk, and build stronger fidelity to your organization and sales principals.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” admin_label=”Services Section” module_id=”rpo” Complete RPO

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Many growth-oriented companies lack internal resources to run dedicated/focused recruiting efforts. No need to wing it any longer. When you need a full solution to run your GTM recruiting efforts, we can help. Our services are tailored for growth company markets specifically.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#5C82B1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ toggle_font=”Bungee||||||||” toggle_font_size=”14px” toggle_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”3%” border_width_all=”0px” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Comprehensive recruitment process design and management” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px”]Our team can work with you to develop a robust, repeatable recruitment process spanning the go-to-market organization, ensuring alignment with other functions and your hiring and growth goals.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Salary benchmarking and compensation recommendations ” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Ensuring proper compensation today can be challenging given changes in market conditions and the growth of distributed work. We can help ensure your compensation aligns to market and make recommendations where necessary to improve execution readiness and overall competitiveness.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”ATS procurement / management & tech stack design” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]We work with a number of technology partners spanning employer branding, applicant tracking, and sourcing platforms. Whether you need ad hoc recommendations or help overseeing purchasing decisions, we can provide guidance and ongoing support.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Employer branding services” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Employer branding is a vital part of developing and sustaining long-term success in talent acquisition. We can help with developing / refining your employee value proposition, ensuring alignment with other functions, and implementing content and messaging on your careers page and other candidate destinations and social channels.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Hiring manager alignment and training” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Too often, start-up and growth companies put new managers and individual contributors into hiring processes without providing basic training on running interviews and making sound assessments of talent. Our team is trained in interview best practices and risk mitigation strategies to ensure that individuals you seek to bring into the hiring process operate professionally and contribute to your hiring effectiveness every step of the way.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Reporting and analytics review” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” open=”off”]Existing data on hiring outcomes is often siloed across systems. Leadership Search

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]Need to make a more senior go-to-market function hire? Blueprint offers search services to ensure you don’t miss. Starting with a thorough assessment of your hiring goals, we’ll run highly targeted sourcing efforts to ensure we place the right leadership candidates in front of you and the organization.

We’ll ensure your process is airtight, and we’ll train all process participants in the interview and vetting process to ensure unconscious bias does not get in the way of your search. We excel in front-line, second line, and leadership roles just below the C-suite.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#54577a” _builder_version=”4.16″ toggle_font=”Bungee||||||||” toggle_font_size=”14px” toggle_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”3%” border_width_all=”0px” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Leadership Roles” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”14px” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”|0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”17px”]

  • Head of Sales/VP of Sales
  • Sales Development Management
  • Regional Sales Director
  • Customer Success Leadership
  • Senior Manager / Director of Marketing
  • VP/Director Revenue Operations and Enablement
  • VP/Director Pre-Sales/Sales Engineering

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” admin_label=”FAQ” module_id=”faq” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”2%||||false|false” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” global_module=”243203″ theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ header_2_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#242855″ header_2_font_size=”21px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”32px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Hiring Companies

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#242855″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”20%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” open_toggle_background_color=”#242855″ closed_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#242855″ icon_color=”#FFFFFF” open_toggle_text_color_tablet=”#FFFFFF” open_toggle_text_color_phone=”” open_toggle_text_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” open_toggle_background_color_tablet=”#242855″ open_toggle_background_color_phone=”” open_toggle_background_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” closed_toggle_background_color_tablet=”#242855″ closed_toggle_background_color_phone=”” closed_toggle_background_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” icon_color_tablet=”#FFFFFF” icon_color_phone=”” icon_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”15px” toggle_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”14px” body_line_height=”1.9em” text_orientation=”left” toggle_text_color_tablet=”#FFFFFF” toggle_text_color_phone=”” toggle_text_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” body_text_color_tablet=”#FFFFFF” body_text_color_phone=”” body_text_color_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” border_width_all=”0px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(12,113,195,0.13)” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How do you charge for your services?” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

We have multiple services packages, depending on the needs of our clients. Please reach out to us for more information, and see our services page for a breakdown of our packages.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Do you recruit outside of the US and Canada?” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]Our focus is currently North America, but we’ve also worked with tremendous people in APAC, LATAM, and EMEA. If you have needs in these regions (whether you are based in North America or elsewhere), we want to hear from you![/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What roles do you recruit?” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]Our team superbly recruits for any roles within go-to-market (GTM) functions, including:

  • Customer Success: Standard, Senior, and Principal Customer Success Managers, Onboarding Specialists, Implementation Managers, Community, Customer Support, & Solutions Architects
  • Marketing: Growth & Demand Generation Marketing, ABM, Events, and Content / SEO Marketing
  • Sales: Sales Development, SMB, Commercial, Mid-Market, Enterprise, and Strategic Account Executives
  • Account Management
  • Revenue Operations and Enablement: Marketing, CS, and Sales Operations
  • Solutions Engineering and Post-Sales Solutions Architects
  • GTM Leadership: Front-line, second-line, VP, and SVP / C Level placements (CRO, CMO, COO)

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”I’ve worked with so many headhunters and recruiting firms. What makes you different?” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]

Put simply, we aspire to be as proficient in articulating your business value prop as your internal employees. Exceptional talent does not want to speak with “head-hunters;” instead, they want to connect with educated ambassadors of your business and your brand about meaningful career opportunities.

We go deep on your business and into talent markets to foster connections that other recruiting firms tend to miss. And we work with our hiring clients to ensure excellence in their hiring process. Please reach out to us for more information!

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is SaaS experience important when hiring?” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]

Hmm, what does this mean anyhow?! We recommend defining the skills and behaviors sought before running a search rather than using buzzwords or phrases from other people’s job descriptions. We help employees go beyond acronyms to ensure they develop robust job descriptions that tie to specific candidate profiles for targeting in the market. Need help? Let us know!

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ header_2_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#242855″ header_2_font_size=”21px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”32px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Job Seekers

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#242855″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”20%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#242855″ open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_text_color=”#242855″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”#242855″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ toggle_text_color=”#242855″ toggle_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”15px” toggle_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_text_color=”#666666″ body_font_size=”14px” body_line_height=”1.9em” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” border_width_all=”0px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(12,113,195,0.13)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”I don’t see any roles for me. What Should I do?” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Blueprint runs a monthly Transferable Skills Workshop to help early talent and career switchers find opportunity in the market and prepare to interview. It’s currently offered at no cost. Interested? Please reach out to us.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How do I negotiate fair compensation ?” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]

The Blueprint team always shares compensation range information with candidates before initial screening calls. Beyond this, we encourage you to consult with review sites and other data sources to educate on the market for the roles you’ve held. Want to discuss? Reach out to us.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is it still important to send a ‘Thank You’ notes?” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]

Interviewing should always be treated as a two-way street, and a candidate should never feel obligated to show gratitude and follow up first.

That said, if you believe a given opportunity aligns to your role and company interests, we recommend sending interviewers a follow-up email after every step in the process. This gives you a chance to recap your learnings & enthusiasms briefly and authentically. It also helps you stay top of mind with interviewing companies.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are some additional basic tips for candidates?” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]

Make sure you prep before every interview, particularly by reviewing the company website, recent new articles, and the linkedin profiles of relevant interviewers and company leaders.

Consider business casual attire – ask your recruiter for any additional guidance. Try to make sure that you are able to sit front and center facing your camera – test it with friends prior to running an interview. If you need to take a call by phone, it’s best to let your recruiter or the hiring manager know in advance, and offer them an option to reschedule if they prefer.

Lastly, prepare some questions in advance based on your research, but do everything you can to stay in the conversation. The more you can listen and be in the moment, the better you’ll execute and be able to vet the opportunity for yourself.

Have more questions? Contact us!

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Why did you launch Blueprint?” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”30px||30px|30px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” open=”off”]

Despite so much innovation in HR tech and recruiting, hiring remains broken. As former operators with decades of experience hiring GTM talent, we wanted to start our own business dedicated to helping B2B tech companies across a range of industries do a better job at attracting and sourcing tremendous (and diverse) talent.

excerpt.rendered:
Recruiting Services Whether you need a partner to run your recruiting function fully, help with specific leadership or front-line sales management search, or run traditional individual contributor-oriented recruiting efforts, we are here to help.

RecruitingWe help many organizations with plug-and-play support to meet specific hiring needs across go-to-market functions.On […]
